title: Ep. 358 - How Did Pride Become A Virtue?
description:
Pride Month is upon us, and corporate America is cashing in on America’s obsession with unusual sex! We will analyze how the queen of sin became our culture’s favorite virtue. Then, the MSM misrepresents a surprising poll on abortion, and 2020 Dems continue to humiliate themselves. Date: 6-03-2019
